item.title: 萨瓦德尔第三季度净利润比 2023 年同期增长 8
item.description: 西班牙萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）周四表示，第三季度净利润比2023年同期增长8%，原因是拨备减少和贷款收入稳定，而此时该银行正在努力抵御竞争对手BBVA的收购要约。【原文：Spain's Sabadell on Thursday said its third-quarter net profit rose 8% from the same period in 2023 on lower provisions and stable lending income at a moment when it is trying to fend off a takeover bid from rival BBVA .】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行因成本和竞争压力导致盈利下降
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的银行预计将在下周公布较低的年度收益报告，投资者关注的焦点是，贷款领域的激烈竞争和存款成本的上升是否会超过抵押贷款收入的增长。【原文：Australia's biggest banks are expected to report lower annual earnings next week, with investors focused on whether intense competition in lending and the rising costs of deposits will outweigh gains in mortgage revenues.】

item.title: 中国商飞在香港设立办事处并签订维修协议，进一步拓展海外市场
item.description: 中国商飞公司（COMAC）的一家子公司周四表示，中国商飞本周在香港开设了中国大陆以外的第二个办事处，这家国有企业正试图打入由西方制造商主导的全球客机市场。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC opened in Hong Kong its second office this week outside mainland China, a subsidiary said on Thursday, as the state-owned company tries to break into a global passenger jet market dominated by Western manufacturers.】

item.title: 住友商事上半年净利润为 2,540 亿日元，下降 11
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp）周四公布，截至 9 月份的六个月净利润为 2,540 亿日元（17 亿美元），比去年同期下降 11%，部分原因是煤炭价格疲软。【原文：Japanese trading house Sumitomo Corp posted on Thursday net profit of 254 billion yen ($1.7 billion) for the six months to September, down 11% from the corresponding period a year ago, partially hit by weak coal prices.】

item.title: 博世下调来年收入预期，不排除裁员可能
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商罗伯特-博世（ROBG.UL）董事长周四警告称，未来一年公司收入将下降，并表示不排除在已宣布裁员7000人的基础上，在德国进一步裁员的可能。【原文：The chairman of German auto parts supplier Robert Bosch (ROBG.UL) warned on Thursday of declining revenue in the coming year, and said he cannot rule out further job cuts in Germany in addition to the 7,000 it has already announced.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，大致维持物价预测
item.description: 此举表明，美国准备继续缩减大规模货币刺激政策。【原文：The move signals its readiness to continue rolling back its massive monetary stimulus.】

item.title: Meta、微软提高人工智能支出，亚马逊财报发布前华尔街忧心忡忡
item.description: 包括微软和 Meta 在内的大型科技公司正在加大投入，建设人工智能数据中心，以满足巨大的需求。【原文：Big tech including Microsoft and Meta are stepping up spending to build out AI data centers in a rush to meet vast demand, but Wall Street is hungry for a quicker payday on the billions invested.】

item.title: 科技股拖累亚洲股市下滑，日本央行决议前日元接近三个月低点
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市下滑，原因是芯片行业股票追随隔夜华尔街同业的跌势，以及 Facebook 所有者 Meta Platforms 公司警告称人工智能成本加速上升。【原文：Asian stocks slid on Thursday as chip-sector stocks tracked overnight declines by Wall Street peers and Facebook owner Meta Platforms warned of accelerating costs for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 丰田供应商电装将全年利润预期下调 21
item.description: 日本电装公司是丰田汽车的主要供应商，在第二季度利润低于分析师预期之后，该公司周四将全年营业利润预期下调了 21%。【原文：Japan's Denso , a leading supplier to Toyota , slashed its full-year operating profit forecast by 21% on Thursday after its second-quarter profit missed analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 智能手机制造商荣耀宣布获得中国电信和中金公司的投资
item.description: 前华为技术公司（HWT.UL）部门 Honor 周四宣布，已从包括中国电信和中金资本公司（CICC Capital Corp）在内的合作伙伴处获得一笔未披露的投资。【原文：Former Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) unit Honor announced on Thursday it had received an undisclosed investment from partners including China Telecom and a unit of CICC Capital Corp.】

item.title: 中国 10 月非制造业活动重回扩张期
item.description: 周四的一项官方调查显示，中国10月份的非制造业活动有所增长，这为政策制定者提供了一些宽慰，尽管其他指标显示世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然遥遥无期。【原文：China's non-manufacturing activity expanded in October, an official survey showed on Thursday, providing some relief to policymakers even as other indicators have suggested recovery in the world's No. 2 economy remains distant.】

item.title: 中国 10 月工厂和服务业活动重回扩张期
item.description: 周四的一项官方工厂调查显示，中国 10 月份的制造业活动出现了六个月来的首次扩张，这支持了政策制定者的乐观预期，即近期的新刺激措施将使世界第二大经济体重回正轨。【原文：China's manufacturing activity in October expanded for the first time in six months, an official factory survey showed on Thursday, supporting policymakers' optimism that recent fresh stimulus will get the world's No. 2 economy back on track.】

item.title: 油价上涨，因对美国燃料需求稳健持乐观态度
item.description: 受原油和汽油库存意外下降后美国燃料需求乐观的推动，油价周四上涨，延续了前一天的涨势，而有关欧佩克+可能推迟增产计划的报道也为油价提供了支撑。【原文：Oil prices rose on Thursday, extending the previous day's rally, driven by optimism over U.S. fuel demand following an unexpected drop in crude and gasoline inventories, while reports that OPEC+ may delay a planned output increase offered support.】

item.title: 日元在日本央行决议前挣扎；美元在就业数据公布前停滞不前
item.description: 日元周四继续承压，因为日本央行似乎将维持超低利率不变，而美元则在本周晚些时候的就业数据和下周的美国总统大选前暂停了上涨。【原文：The yen remained under pressure on Thursday as the Bank of Japan looked set to keep ultra-low interest rates steady, while the U.S. dollar paused ahead of jobs data later this week and the U.S. presidential election next week.】

item.title: 韩国锌业股价在监察机构通报会前连续第二天暴跌
item.description: 在全球最大的锌精炼企业决定发行新股后，韩国锌业公司股票周四连续第二个交易日下滑。【原文：Shares of Korea Zinc slumped for a second straight session on Thursday, after a decision by the world's top zinc refiner to issue new stocks.】

item.title: 据《环球邮报》报道，Blackstone 接近 50 亿美元的罗杰斯投资
item.description: 据《环球邮报》周三报道，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone Inc 正出价 70 亿加元（50.3 亿美元）收购电信及媒体公司 Rogers Communications 手机基础设施业务的少数股权。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone Inc is bidding C$7 billion ($5.03 billion) for a minority stake in telecom and media company Rogers Communications's cellphone infrastructure business, the Globe and Mail reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 错过人工智能热潮，三星利润复苏乏力
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）表示，其第三季度利润较上年同期大幅增长，但复苏步伐较上一季度有所减弱，因为该公司正努力从人工智能热潮中套现，而人工智能热潮使台积电（TSMC）和 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）等芯片竞争对手受益匪浅。【原文：Samsung Electronics said its third-quarter profit jumped from a year earlier, but the pace of recovery weakened from the prior quarter as it struggles to cash in on the AI boom that has benefited chip rivals like TSMC and SK Hynix .】

item.title: 因 IT 服务需求逐步复苏，Cognizant 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 本周三，Cognizant Technology Solutions 的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于需求复苏，越来越多的企业转向这家 IT 服务提供商。【原文：Cognizant Technology Solutions beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by recovery in demand as more businesses turn to the IT services provider.】

item.title: 由于需求稳定，Equinix 预测季度收入高于预期
item.description: 受人工智能热潮持续升温对数据中心服务稳定需求的推动，Equinix 周三预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Equinix forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, driven by steady demand for its data center services amid the continuing surge in artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯业务低迷，美高梅国际酒店集团季度业绩不及预期
item.description: 受拉斯维加斯赌场业务销售疲软的影响，美高梅国际酒店集团周三第三季度利润和营收不及市场预期，股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 5%。【原文：MGM Resorts International missed market expectations for third-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, hurt by weak sales in its Las Vegas casino business, sending its shares down more than 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Coles 第一季度销售额增长约 3%，主要得益于强劲的促销活动
item.description: 澳大利亚 Coles 公司周四公布第一季度销售额增长 2.9%，主要得益于超市部门强劲的促销活动和电子商务的增长。【原文：Australia's Coles posted a 2.9% jump in first-quarter sales on Thursday, driven primarily by strong performance in its supermarkets division on strong promotional activity and e-commerce growth.】

item.title: 团体福利业务疲软导致大都会人寿利润下滑
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife）周三公布的第三季度调整后利润下降，原因是该公司团体福利业务表现疲软，股价盘后下跌 5.5%。【原文：MetLife reported a fall in third-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, owing to weak performance in the insurer's group benefits business, sending its shares down 5.5% after the bell.】

item.title: 早间新闻日本央行和中国采购经理人指数全日大丰收
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 耐克公司高管斯卢舍被任命为 USOPP 首席执行官
item.description: 耐克公司的长期高管约翰-斯鲁舍（John Slusher）周三被任命为美国奥林匹克和残奥会产业公司（USOPP）的首席执行官，该公司负责营销和销售 2028 年洛杉矶奥运会的商业资产以及美国队在 2028 年之前的参赛权。【原文：Longtime Nike executive John Slusher on Wednesday was named CEO of the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Properties (USOPP), the entity charged with marketing and selling commercial assets for the 2028 Games in Los Angeles and rights to Team USA through 2028.】

item.title: 精神航空公司将解雇数百名飞行员以削减成本
item.description: 精神航空公司发言人告诉路透社，该公司将于 2025 年 1 月 31 日解雇约 330 名飞行员，作为削减成本和巩固财务状况努力的一部分。【原文：Spirit Airlines will furlough about 330 pilots on Jan. 31, 2025, a company spokesperson told Reuters, as part of its efforts to cut costs and shore up its finances.】

item.title: 保诚金融调整后利润因国际业务疲软而下降
item.description: 保险商保诚金融公司周三公布，第三季度调整后利润下降，原因是承保业绩不佳和支出增加导致国际业务疲软。【原文：Insurer Prudential Financial reported a fall in third-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, hurt by weakness in its international business due to less favorable underwriting results and higher expenses.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，关注全球风险
item.description: 日本央行周四维持超低利率不变，并表示有必要仔细审视全球经济发展情况，强调在决定下一步何时收紧政策时，将重点关注脆弱的国内经济复苏所面临的风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan maintained ultra-low interest rates on Thursday and signalled the need to scrutinise global economic developments, highlighting its focus on risks to a fragile domestic recovery in deciding when to next tighten policy.】

item.title: 预订控股公司季度利润超出预期，得益于国际旅游业的健康发展
item.description: 在线旅行社Booking Holdings周三公布的第三季度利润和营收超出分析师预期，原因是国际旅游需求的恢复性增长抵消了美国和中国国内旅游的疲软。【原文：Online travel agency Booking Holdings beat analysts' expectations for third-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, as resilient demand for international travel offset the weakness in domestic travel in the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 西门子将以 106 亿美元收购工程软件公司 Altair
item.description: 美国工程软件公司西门子周三表示，将以 106 亿美元的价格收购 Altair Engineering，以加强其在快速增长的工业软件市场的地位。【原文：Siemens will buy Altair Engineering for $10.6 billion, the American engineering software firm said on Wednesday, as it seeks to strengthen its presence in the fast-growing industrial software market.】

item.title: 由于价格上涨，CF 工业公司季度利润猛增 68
item.description: 化肥生产商 CF Industries 周三公布，受氮肥价格走强的影响，第三季度利润增长了 68%。【原文：Fertilizer maker CF Industries on Wednesday reported a 68% rise in third-quarter profit, aided by strong prices for nitrogen fertilizers.】
